sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>For those not used to extremes of heat or cold, thermal protection is a must. Thermal cloaks can be worn while on the move, or used as a blanket or makeshift tent. Depending on the technical access of the user, these could be simple but effective fabric blends or ultra-thin synthetic meshes than can collapse into a pocket. Most offer support for cold environments, with more clever models having reflective materials to also aid in areas of excessive heat. Thermal blankets and thermal cloaks remove up to 2 setback dice from any checks made to handle the effects of extreme heat or cold.  Models Include: Numerous Variants.</description> <encumbrance>2</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Thermal Cloak</name> <number>GEAR0001088</number> <price>200</price> <range/> <rarity>1</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 21:38:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d97188b82f14a450e0f497eef699b623</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 21:38:59</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
